tool_description: Simple API for real time currency data for 144 countries. Get currency rate or convert amounts directy
name: Currency Exchange
title: Currency Exchange

api_list.name: symbols
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-exchange19.p.rapidapi.com/symbols"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-exchange19.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-exchange19.p.rapidapi.com/symbols"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-exchange19.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.description: Convert amount from one currency into an other.
